description: Connect to a painlessMesh network Allows to connect from Android to a painlessMesh network and act like a node. The app can connect, request routing info (NODE_SYNC_REQUEST) and send single (SINGLE) and broadcast (BROADCAST) messages. There is no support for (TIME_DELAY), (TIME_SYNC) and (NODE_SYNC_REPLY). The app is connecting to the closest painlessMesh AP. Due to restrictions of Android, painlessMesh can not have AP and STA mode running in parallel. Since Android 6 it requires the location service permission from the user to be able to scan for Wi-Fi networks.
